description: Master library of AI prompt cards for productivity, marketing, sales, finance, and learning.

Operations & Productivity.title: Daily Operations Manager
Operations & Productivity.purpose: Automate recurring work and build daily rhythm.
Operations & Productivity.prompt: Act as my operations manager for my [business/job role]. Handle all repetitive tasks like [reports, emails, summaries, etc.]. Create a simple daily system that completes each with precision, consistency, and minimal input from me.
Operations & Productivity.quick_start: Use this when you want ChatGPT to design a loop system for your daily workflow.

Operations & Productivity.title: Personal Time-Saver
Operations & Productivity.purpose: Collapse wasted hours into focused minutes.
Operations & Productivity.prompt: Act like a personal productivity optimizer. I waste time on [tasks]. Build a personalized 3-step plan to complete them faster, automate what can be delegated, and delete what doesn’t require my attention.
Operations & Productivity.quick_start: Use after a time audit to refactor your daily habits.

Operations & Productivity.title: Smart Email Assistant
Operations & Productivity.purpose: Instantly polish or template your inbox replies.
Operations & Productivity.prompt: You are my email executive for [industry/niche]. Create reply and outreach templates for clients, follow-ups, and complaints. Keep the tone smart, polite, and efficient.
Operations & Productivity.quick_start: Use this to generate reusable drafts or tone-consistent replies.

Operations & Productivity.title: Full-Time Personal Assistant
Operations & Productivity.prompt: Each morning at 8 AM, generate my daily brief: Calendar summary, 3 priority tasks, 2 learning insights in [topic], and 1 motivational quote. Make it concise, focused, and high-ROI.
Operations & Productivity.quick_start: Drop this in a daily ChatGPT thread or automation shortcut.

Operations & Productivity.title: Business Automation Consultant
Operations & Productivity.prompt: Analyze my current workflow in [role/business]. Identify every repetitive or low-value task. Suggest specific ChatGPT-based automations, including templates for email, reports, SOPs, or documentation.
Operations & Productivity.quick_start: Run this monthly to build an automation backlog.

Marketing & Branding.title: Social Media Content Machine
Marketing & Branding.prompt: Act as a content expert in [niche]. Plan 7 days of posts for [platforms]. Include hooks, captions, visuals, and CTAs using proven psychological triggers.
Marketing & Branding.quick_start: Batch-create content before a launch or event.

Marketing & Branding.title: End-to-End Marketing Engine
Marketing & Branding.prompt: You’re my Head of Marketing. Based on my product/service in [niche], build a complete funnel: offer positioning, landing page copy, ad scripts, email flows, social content, and tracking metrics. Keep it launch-ready.
Marketing & Branding.quick_start: Use for offer creation or rebranding cycles.

Marketing & Branding.title: Personal Branding Architect
Marketing & Branding.prompt: Design a 30-day personal branding blueprint for [field]. Include post topics, engagement strategies, content loops, and viral hook ideas across LinkedIn, Instagram, and Twitter.
Marketing & Branding.quick_start: Use quarterly to refresh your online presence.

Marketing & Branding.title: Content Studio + Repurposing
Marketing & Branding.prompt: Create a full content system for [topic]. Draft a master script, captions, email newsletter, and blog post. Then repurpose into short-form variations for Twitter, Reels, LinkedIn, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts.
Marketing & Branding.quick_start: Feed it one main essay or transcript to generate multiple outputs.

Sales & Client Ops.title: Business Research Analyst
Sales & Client Ops.prompt: Act as my research analyst for [industry/niche]. Find competitor strategies, pricing, and opportunities. Deliver 3 actionable insights I can use today for an edge.
Sales & Client Ops.quick_start: Run monthly as a market radar refresh.

Sales & Client Ops.title: Client Closer
Sales & Client Ops.prompt: Act like a deal closer for [business/service]. Create a high-conversion follow-up sequence for email, DM, and calls to turn warm leads into clients.
Sales & Client Ops.quick_start: Use this to generate automated client follow-up sequences.

Sales & Client Ops.title: High-Ticket Sales Closer
Sales & Client Ops.prompt: I offer [product/service]. Create objection-handling scripts, qualifying questions, and follow-up frameworks that help close 5-figure clients consistently.
Sales & Client Ops.quick_start: Use to train your own sales tone or integrate into CRM automation.

Sales & Client Ops.title: Proposal & Report Generator
Sales & Client Ops.prompt: Act as my documentation lead. Generate polished proposals, weekly reports, and SOPs for [business/job]. Output as a reusable template.
Sales & Client Ops.quick_start: Run this when you need a clean, pro-formatted report.

Finance & Debt Systems.title: Debt Snapshot
Finance & Debt Systems.prompt: My debts: [lender | balance | APR | min payment | due date | status]. Build a table sorted by APR, show totals, and highlight top 3 cost drivers.
Finance & Debt Systems.quick_start: Use this as a foundation for payoff planning.

Finance & Debt Systems.title: Payoff Plan (Avalanche vs Snowball)
Finance & Debt Systems.prompt: I can pay an extra [$X] monthly starting [YYYY-MM-DD]. Create both Avalanche and Snowball payoff plans, with interest saved and timeline table. Recommend which to follow.
Finance & Debt Systems.quick_start: Use for goal-based debt elimination tracking.

Finance & Debt Systems.title: Negotiation Scripts
Finance & Debt Systems.purpose: Talk your way into lower rates.
Finance & Debt Systems.prompt: For each lender [list], write a 150-word script to request rate reduction or hardship assistance. Include backup phrases if they push back and confirm key points.
Finance & Debt Systems.quick_start: Run before calling lenders for better terms.

Finance & Debt Systems.title: Balance Transfer / Refi Check
Finance & Debt Systems.prompt: Offer: promo APR [%] for [months], transfer fee [%]. Compare staying vs transferring for debts [IDs], show breakeven month, cost difference, and Go/No-Go verdict.
Finance & Debt Systems.quick_start: Helps you decide if a balance transfer is worth it.

Finance & Debt Systems.title: Cashflow Guardrails
Finance & Debt Systems.prompt: Income [$], fixed bills [$], variable avg [$]. Build a zero-based budget with 3-day early autopays and surplus allocation to highest APR. Return one-page budget + calendar.
Finance & Debt Systems.quick_start: Creates a visual cashflow strategy with autopay order.

Finance & Debt Systems.title: Collections & Disputes
Finance & Debt Systems.prompt: Accounts in collections: [list]. Draft debt validation letters, call scripts, and a dispute timeline checklist.
Finance & Debt Systems.quick_start: Use for organizing your credit repair plan.

Finance & Debt Systems.title: Credit Score Lift
Finance & Debt Systems.prompt: Cards: [list with limits]. Create utilization targets (< X % overall, < Y % per card), recommend payment tweaks and a 60-day credit improvement plan.
Finance & Debt Systems.quick_start: Use before major financing or mortgage applications.

Learning & Development.title: Hyper-Effective Learning
Learning & Development.prompt: Act as my learning coach. I want to master [topic/skill] in 30 days. Create a micro-lesson plan with quizzes, assignments, and real-world practice. Track and adjust based on progress.
Learning & Development.quick_start: Use for structured self-study with built-in feedback.
